    • Method Detail

      • setTabIcon

        public void setTabIcon(net.minecraft.item.Item icon)
        Sets an Item to serve as a CreativeTabs's icon.

        Used in ClientProxy after Items and their textures are registered, to avoid errors
        Parameters:
        icon - The Item to be used for the CreativeTabs icon

      • getTabIconItem

        public net.minecraft.item.Item getTabIconItem()
        Returns the current state of tabIcon.

        Run whenever the tab is rendered
        Specified by:
        getTabIconItem in class net.minecraft.creativetab.CreativeTabs
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If Minecraft tries to render the tab but tabIcon is null or the item has not been textured

      • getIconItemStack

        public net.minecraft.item.ItemStack getIconItemStack()

        Run whenever the tab is rendered
        Overrides:
        getIconItemStack in class net.minecraft.creativetab.CreativeTabs
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If Minecraft tries to render the tab but tabIcon or tabIconItemStack is null or the item has not been textured
